content:
I rendered a primary navigation menu (can't just place a block) programmatically with the following code:

  $menu_block = module_invoke('menu','block_view','main-menu');
  print render($menu_block['content']);

and it works just fine, except all the configuration options are lost. Does anyone happen to know how to programmatically render a block together with config options?

I don't think there's a clean answer in there, but:
https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/how-embed-block-templates
